SEARCH
Package wordle

Class LevelsController

java.lang.Object
wordle.LevelsController
public class LevelsController extends Object
Controller class for handling level selection and management in the Wordle game. This class allows the player to choose and access game levels based on their difficulty and unlocked status.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    highestLevelUnlocked
    The highest level unlocked by the player, determining which levels are accessible.

  • Method Details

    • setPlayerId

      public void setPlayerId(int id)
      Sets the player ID in the label on the level selection screen.
      Parameters:
      id - the player's ID to set

    • setDebug

      public void setDebug(boolean debug)
      Enables or disables debug mode.
      Parameters:
      debug - true to enable debug mode, false to disable

    • updatePlayerIdLabel

      public void updatePlayerIdLabel()
      Updates the label displaying the player's ID with the current value.

    • getPlayerHighestLevelUnlocked

      public int getPlayerHighestLevelUnlocked(int playerId, String filename)
      Retrieves the highest level unlocked by the player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player's ID to query the highest level unlocked
      filename - the filename of the csv file.
      Returns:
      the highest level unlocked by the player

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after the FXML file has been loaded. This method sets up the level buttons and updates the level access and player ID label based on the current player data.

    • handleEasyButtonAction

      protected void handleEasyButtonAction()
      Handles the action when the Easy button is clicked. This method loads the view for easy levels.

    • handleMediumButtonAction

      protected void handleMediumButtonAction()
      Handles the action when the Medium button is clicked. This method loads the view for medium levels.

    • handleHardButtonAction

      protected void handleHardButtonAction()
      Handles the action when the Hard button is clicked. This method loads the view for hard levels.

    • goToMainMenu

      protected void goToMainMenu()
      Handles the action to return to the main menu of the game.
